Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can include a string telephone device in their drawing, showing the use of string and cups.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can represent the concept of communication over distance, showing the string connecting the two students.
The student can demonstrate in their drawing that the device is used for communication by labeling or illustrating the process of talking and listening.
